description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 09 September 2020 (RN 20/02305/LBC) for the refurbishment works to single-family dwelling, including infilling of rear lightwell at lower-ground floor level, creation of a metal bridge from rear first floor level to connect with existing terrace and associated changes to opening in the rear elevation, new balustrade around rear first floor terrace and installation of plant and kitchen extract within enclosure at main roof level and associated internal works including the installation of new air conditioning equipment and joinery. NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to alter the profile of the under pavement vault floor slab, and the insertion of double pocket doors within the joinery at fourth floor.
